result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدۡخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفۡعَلُ مَا يُرِيدُ
result.translation: 14. Diggah Yalli isee kee isi farmoyta nummayseeh, meqe taamoomi abbaasite mara jannootay guba weeqaytitte как gexxa ken culsa, diggah Yalli isih faxem aba, meqe mara galtaah, uma mara digaalaamal.
